makeBinaryRequest

  • makeBinaryRequest(method: string, url: string, onLoad: IOnLoad, onError: IOnError | Deferred<any>, sessionId?: string): XMLHttpRequest
    • Defined in lib-client/xhr-utils.ts:71

    This assembles XMLHttpRequest with 'Content-Type: application/octet-stream'. Session id header is added, if string id is given.

    Parameters

    • method: string
    • url: string
    • onLoad: IOnLoad
    • onError: IOnError | Deferred<any>

      it can either be an actual error handling function, or a deferred object that gets rejected in a default way.

    • Optional sessionId: string

    Returns XMLHttpRequest

    XMLHttpRequest object, setup and ready for send(blob).

makeBodylessRequest

  • makeBodylessRequest(method: string, url: string, onLoad: IOnLoad, onError: IOnError | Deferred<any>, sessionId?: string): XMLHttpRequest
    • Defined in lib-client/xhr-utils.ts:107

    This assembles XMLHttpRequest without 'Content-Type'. Session id header is added, if string id is given.

    Parameters

    • method: string
    • url: string
    • onLoad: IOnLoad
    • onError: IOnError | Deferred<any>

      it can either be an actual error handling function, or a deferred object that gets rejected in a default way.

    • Optional sessionId: string

    Returns XMLHttpRequest

    XMLHttpRequest object, setup and ready for send(string).

makeJsonRequest

  • makeJsonRequest(method: string, url: string, onLoad: IOnLoad, onError: IOnError | Deferred<any>, sessionId?: string): JSONHttpRequest
    • Defined in lib-client/xhr-utils.ts:51

    This assembles XMLHttpRequest with 'Content-Type: application/json'. Session id header is added, if string id is given.

    Parameters

    • method: string
    • url: string
    • onLoad: IOnLoad
    • onError: IOnError | Deferred<any>

      it can either be an actual error handling function, or a deferred object that gets rejected in a default way.

    • Optional sessionId: string

    Returns JSONHttpRequest

    JSONHttpRequest object, which is a XMLHttpRequest with attached sendJSON() method.

makeTextRequest

  • makeTextRequest(method: string, url: string, onLoad: IOnLoad, onError: IOnError | Deferred<any>, sessionId?: string): XMLHttpRequest
    • Defined in lib-client/xhr-utils.ts:89

    This assembles XMLHttpRequest with 'Content-Type: text/plain'. Session id header is added, if string id is given.

    Parameters

    • method: string
    • url: string
    • onLoad: IOnLoad
    • onError: IOnError | Deferred<any>

      it can either be an actual error handling function, or a deferred object that gets rejected in a default way.

    • Optional sessionId: string

    Returns XMLHttpRequest

    XMLHttpRequest object, setup and ready for send(string).

reject

  • reject(deferred: Deferred<any>, statusOrXhr: XMLHttpRequest | number, errMsg?: string): void
    • Defined in lib-client/xhr-utils.ts:138

    This sets a reject in a given deferred to HttpError with a given message, status field, and XMLHttpRequest, if it has been given.

    Parameters

    • deferred: Deferred<any>

      is deferred object that has its rejected state set by this function.

    • statusOrXhr: XMLHttpRequest | number
    • Optional errMsg: string

    Returns void
